title: Chocolate Avocado Milkshake Recipe
full_text:
Chocolate Avocado Milkshake Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
90 mins
Freeze Time
90 mins
Total
95 mins
Makes
3 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
cups
whole milk
2
ounces
bittersweet chocolate
, finely chopped
3
tablespoons
water
4
teaspoons
cocoa powder
1
ripe
avocado
4
tablespoons
granulated sugar
1
teaspoon
pure
vanilla extract
Directions
Pour milk into freezer safe container and freeze until half frozen, about 1 1/2 hours.
While milk is freezing, place chocolate and water in microwave safe bowl and heat on high power until chocolate is melted, about 30 seconds. Whisk in cocoa until smooth; set aside.
Halve and pit avocado. Scoop avocado flesh into blender. Add chocolate mixture, sugar, vanilla, and frozen milk. Blend until smooth, 15 to 30 seconds. Serve.
Special equipment
Blender, microwave
Desserts
Chocolate
Avocado
